Body:
with case_setup_force_frame_eval.test_file('_debugger_case_simple_calls.py'
    ) as writer:
    writer.write_add_breakpoint(10, 'Method2')
    writer.write_add_exception_breakpoint_with_policy('IndexError', '0',
        '1', '0')
    writer.write_make_initial_run()
    hit = writer.wait_for_breakpoint_hit(line=10)
    assert hit.suspend_type == 'frame_eval'
    writer.write_run_thread(hit.thread_id)
    writer.finished_ok = True
